org.fhnw.aigs.commons.communication

Class ForceCloseMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fhnw.aigs.commons.communication.Message
      • org.fhnw.aigs.commons.communication.ForceCloseMessage

  • public class ForceCloseMessage
extends Message
    This message is sent to clients when there is an error or another event that causes the clients to close, e.g. the server shuts down, the connection was aborted etc.
    Version:
    v1.0
    Author:
    Matthias St√∂ckli
